title: Public Media & Local Communities #lastweektonight
description: Public media is essential to many local communities. Sometimes in a life-saving way, like when they warn people about hurricanes and other emergencies. But also, when they let people know a used bidet is available for the low, low price of $50.

title: Public Media & Local News #lastweektonight
description: In some places, public media is the only source of local news. And while some may think of it as non-essential, local news can have some surprisingly heavy-hitting stories! As evidenced by this literally heavy brick that hit a local reporter’s window.

title: Public Media #lastweektonight

description:

title: Government Surveillance: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
description:
There are very few government checks on what America’s sweeping surveillance programs are capable of doing. John Oliver sits down with Edward Snowden to discuss the NSA, the balance between privacy and security, and dick-pics.

description:

title: Supreme Court Dogs: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
description:

Tag them with #RealAnimalsFakePaws so we can find them.

Audio from Supreme Court cases available at:

description:
Cable companies are trying to create an unequal playing field for internet speeds, but they're doing it so boringly that most news outlets aren't covering it. 
John Oliver explains the controversy and lets viewers know how they can voice their displeasure to the FCC.

(www.fcc.gov/comments, for any interested parties)
